attributes.action: Any vote by Parliament to leave the EU must be subject to a people’s vote.
attributes.additional_details:
Deliberate obfuscation over what constituted the “will of the people”by those wanting Britain to leave the EU conflicts with the reality of polls showing Remain ahead & growing.
2 million of 17.4/53 million have died.2016  16 & 17 year olds are now voters & 3/4 of them are Remainers.The country is a Remain majority nation without doubt,as polls,petitions & people’s marches show. MPs if they are indeed the servants of the people,as the PM declared on 26 July 2019, should Revoke A50,& allow PplsVt
attributes.background: Leaving  the EU in any way, either by parliamentary vote or election manifesto, must be subject to a people’s vote with the option to Remain in the EU on the ballot.It must exclude the option of a No Deal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like the Government to revoke article 50 or whether you'd like to have a second referendum on any deal agreed with the EU. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
